instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Replace GPU in mac pro card
threads.message:
It is possible to replace and find new GPU on this video card?

[url]http://www.ebay.es/itm/nVidia-GeForce-8800GT-512MB-Apple-Mac-Pro-Graphics-Video-Card-2008-2012-3-1-4-1-/222131763770?hash=item33b815ba3a:g:orAAAOSwn8FXSJqE[/url]

Never repair this. It is G92-270-A2

threads.title: Replace GPU in mac pro card
threads.message: G92-270 is easy to find Ebay is full of them. Can also be replaced with G92-700/20/40. Reball the new chip with lead before putting it on.
